attributes.action: resign for continual lying to the British public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair has lied to this great country for so long, the war on Iraq, increased taxes making us the highest taxed country in the modern world, fixing figures on crime health and education, time has come Mr Blair go now we dont want you and take Mr Brown with you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
